channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15373] DEPRECATED_NAME_OF_NO_LIMIT_THROUGHPUT_CONTROLLER_CLASS value is wrong in CompactionThroughputControllerFactory
item.description: I couldn't turn off compaction throughput by following release note instructions. I fixed release notes in parent but also needs code fix in factory class.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Minor issue. Trim the configuration value and then remove the '.java' suffix....it was not intentional.

-1 overall
